name: liminal-chat
description: A threshold between human and AI communication

scripts.precommit:api-keys: git diff --cached --name-only | grep -v '/docs/.*/assets/.*\.js$' | grep -v '\.html$' | grep -v 'package-lock\.json$' | xargs grep -E -n -H '(sk_test_|pk_test_|sk_live_|pk_live_|api_key|apikey|api-key|secret_key|secretkey|secret-key|private_key|privatekey|private-key)[[:space:]]*[=:][[:space:]]*[A-Za-z0-9+/]{20,}|[A-Za-z0-9+/]{40,}' 2>/dev/null || echo 'No API key patterns found'
scripts.precommit:sensitive-files: git diff --cached --name-only | grep -E "\.(pem|key|p12)$|credentials\.json|id_rsa" || echo "No sensitive filenames found"
scripts.precommit:env-files: git diff --cached --name-only | grep -E "^\.env" || echo "No .env files found"
scripts.precommit:debug-statements: git diff --cached --name-only | grep -E "\.(ts|js|tsx|jsx)$" | xargs grep -n "console\.log\|debugger" 2>/dev/null || echo "No debug statements found"
scripts.precommit:security-todos: git diff --cached --name-only | xargs grep -n -i "TODO.*\(password\|secret\|key\|token\|auth\|security\)" 2>/dev/null || echo "No security TODOs found"
scripts.precommit:hardcoded-ips: git diff --cached --name-only | grep -E "\.(ts|js|tsx|jsx)$" | xargs grep -n -E "localhost|127\.0\.0\.1|192\.168\.|10\.|172\." 2>/dev/null | head -20 || echo "No hardcoded IPs found"
scripts.precommit:large-files: git diff --cached --name-only | xargs ls -lh 2>/dev/null | awk '$5 ~ /[0-9]+M/ {print $5, $9}' | head -10 || echo "No large files found"
scripts.precommit:binary-files: git diff --cached --name-only | xargs file 2>/dev/null | grep -v "text" | grep -v "empty" | head -10 || echo "No unexpected binary files"
scripts.precommit:branch-check: git branch --show-current | grep -E "^(main|master)$" && echo "WARNING: You are on the main/master branch!" || echo "Branch check passed"
